text: The 2005 Primera B de Chile was second tier’s 55th season. Santiago Morning was the tournament’s champion, winning its third title. ==Qualification== ===Group stage=== ====North Group==== ====Centre Group==== ====South Group==== ===Accumulated table=== ==Relegation table== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor=#006699 !
